conversion_verification.notes: The conversion demonstrates high fidelity isometric projection with consistent wall thickness and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Near-perfect 3D transformation; wall heights and corner geometry are excellently rendered.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room configuration and wall placement. The garage area in the bottom right is repurposed with furniture but maintains structural footprint.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is logical and matches the intended use of rooms, though the garage is staged as a living space.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent rendering quality. Minor points deducted for 'COVERED PATIO' text remaining on the 3D floor surface.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan ('COVERED PATIO') are baked into the 3D floor geometry.
The 2-car garage is staged as a large living/dining area instead of a utility space.

summary: A highly professional 3D conversion that meticulously translates the 2D floor plan into a geometrically accurate isometric model with consistent wall thickness and clear spatial volume.
